heading: HB02912
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE PHILIPPINE RUBBER INDUSTRY DEVELOPMENT BOARD, DEFINING ITS POWERS AND FUNCTIONS AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02912
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE PHILIPPINE RUBBER INDUSTRY DEVELOPMENT BOARD, DEFINING ITS POWERS AND FUNCTIONS AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : AMATONG, ISAGANI S.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-15
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Catamco (018 2016-09-05)2. Tejada (019 2016-09-06)
3. Violago (059 2017-01-18)4. Nieto (000 2018-12-10)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-01-17
          -The Body created a technical working group that would further study the bill, to be chaired by Rep. Isagani Amatong.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2016-08-22
